title: service of a kind specified in paragraph (d) of Part 2 of Schedule 4 to the ValueAdded Tax Consolidation Act 2010 (No. 31 of 2010) that is provided on or after
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Value-Added Tax (Restriction of Flat-
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Value-Added Tax (Restriction of Flat-

Rate Addition) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited value-added tax (restriction flat- rate addition) order 2025

title: service of a kind specified in paragraph (d) of Part 2 of Schedule 4 to the ValueAdded Tax Consolidation Act 2010 (No. 31 of 2010) that is provided on or after
heading: 2. The flat-rate addition shall not apply to the supply of an agricultural
text_raw:
2. The flat-rate addition shall not apply to the supply of an agricultural 
service of a kind specified in paragraph (d) of Part 2 of Schedule 4 to the ValueAdded Tax Consolidation Act 2010 (No. 31 of 2010) that is provided on or after 
1 September 2025 in the course of the production of broiler chickens. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 July, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [327] 3

title: service of a kind specified in paragraph (d) of Part 2 of Schedule 4 to the ValueAdded Tax Consolidation Act 2010 (No. 31 of 2010) that is provided on or after
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order is issued by the Minister for Finance under Section 86A of the ValueAdded Tax Consolidation Act 2010. It excludes from the flat rate addition the 
supply of any agricultural service of stock minding, rearing and fattening in the 
course of the production of broiler chickens. 

The exclusion will have effect from 1 September. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [327]
